name: 陳雅玫
objective: This course will examine different text types and acquaint students with the techniques and methodologies available in translating these texts. Attention will not only be given to usage, but also to issues of discourse. This course is intended to prepare students for more specialized translation training.
schedule:
Week 1　　Introduction
Week 2　　(1) different text types and translation/(2) discourse analysis and translator
Week 3　　translation of journalistic texts
Week 4　　translation of journalsitic texts
Week 5　　translation of scientific and technical texts
Week 6       translation of scientific and technical texts
Week 7       N/A
Week 8　　translation of advertising texts
Week 9       Mid-term 
Week 10　　translation of advertising texts
Week 11     translation of tourism texts
Week 12     translation of tourism texts
Week 13     translaiton of commercial and financial texts
Week 14　　translation of legal texts
Week 15　　transation of medical texts
Week 16　　Wrap up
Week 17     Holiday
Week 18　　Final exam
scorePolicy:
1. attendance & participation: 15%
2. translation quizzes: 30%
3. translation assignment: 30%
4. final-exam: 25%
materials:
1. instructor’s lecture handouts
2. selected readings from the following books:
《文體與翻譯》（劉宓慶）；《翻譯初階》（周兆祥）；《傳媒翻譯》（鄭寶璇）；《新聞翻譯：原則與方法》（李德鳳）；An Encyclopaedia of translation: Chinese-English, English-Chinese (Chan, S. and D. Pollard ed.)；Thinking Chinese Translation (Valerie Pellatt and Eric T. Liu)
